https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t0ISGhwZtghakg46TWCOWBTIflZ.jpg Three moments in Takaki's life: his relationship with Akari and their forced separation; his friendship with Kanae, who is secretly in love with him; the demands and disappointments of adulthood, an unhappy life in a cold city. 5 Centimeters per Second
